title: And Just Like That....Episode 5 Review - "Tragically Hip'
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 5 Review - "Tragically Hip'
itunes:subtitle: Where they keep beating a dead horse
description:
Between Charlotte's ongoing parenting struggles with a gender fluid child to Miranda's alcoholism and the repercussions of said alcoholism (spoiler alert - it's infidelity), can someone PLEASE call PETA since "And Just Like That" keeps on beating a dead horse? Is And Just Like That trying to be "too hip" in the day and age of wokeness? How do we feel about the evolution and change of our beloved characters? Now that Big is gone, do we ACTUALLY like Carrie and what she's become?


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
